text: The Karachi Stock Exchange or KSE (founded 1947) is a stock exchange in Karachi, Sindh, Pakistan. It is Pakistan's largest and oldest stock exchange and also South Asia's second oldest stock exchange.Market Hours, Karachi Stock Exchange via Wikinvest == References == Category:Stock exchanges in Asia Category:Economy of Pakistan Category:Karachi Category:Organizations based in Pakistan
title: National Stock Exchange of Pakistan
